name: Sim Racing Dash for F1 2018
description:
Sim Racing Dash for F1 2018 is a telemetry app for Codemasters F1 2018(PS4, Xbox one, PC).

This app features real-time vehicle telemetry of crucial vehicle data. Designed by a racing mechanical engineer for race car drivers it includes graphing of ERS, RPM, Speed, Gear, Throttle, Brake, Lap, etc.

Get the advantage over your opposition by knowing exactly whats going on with your car at all times.

Want more? There is also a HUD and one of the most important things, a dedicated race page showing you critical fuel, tire (wear/temps/pressures), brake (temps), damage, a must have for any racer.

This app will work with both the PC and Console versions of F12018.
Please enable UDP telemetry in game settings.

Here is the demo video of this application.
https://youtu.be/k58EiYbEyts

Have fun!
